CustomField.description: When the dog may need to have some shot. Shown in header.
CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "None") || ISBLANK(TEXT(Status__c)), IMAGE("/img/icon/custom51_100/chalkboard16.png", '*') & " N/A", IF( AND( TODAY() + 60 < (PhysicalExamDue__c ), TODAY() + 60 < (VaccineDueDA2PP__c ), TODAY() + 60 < (VaccineDueRabies__c ) ), IMAGE('/img/msg_icons/confirm16.png', '*') & ' Good', IF(AND( TODAY() < (PhysicalExamDue__c ), TODAY() < (VaccineDueDA2PP__c ), TODAY() < (VaccineDueRabies__c ) ), IMAGE('/img/msg_icons/warning16.png', '*') & ' Due Soon', IMAGE('/img/msg_icons/error16.png', '*')) & ' Expired'))
CustomField.label: Health Record Status
